definition: to stand/to set up/to establish/to lay down/to draw up/at once/immediately
first month of the lunar year
straight/upright/proper/main/principal/to correct/to rectify/exactly/just (at that time)/right (in that place)/(math.) positive

pinyin: jian4 li4 zheng4 shi4 wai4 jiao1 guan1 xi4

sentences.english: The soldiers stood at ramrod attention.
The captain brought the men to attention as the general arrived.
sentences.chinese: 将军到达时，上尉命令战士们立正。

sentences.english: The soldier hastily butted his cigarette and came to attention.
sentences.chinese: 那个士兵匆匆地熄灭香烟，立正。

sentences.english: The commands Attention and Halt are only one word.
sentences.chinese: 立正和稍息的口令只有一个字。

sentences.english: The officer ordered the men to stand at attention.
sentences.chinese: 军官要求所有的人员立正。

sentences.english: The sergeant brought the guards to attention and saluted the inspection officer.
sentences.chinese: 中士令卫队立正并向检阅官敬礼。

sentences.english: The soldier clicked his heels and saluted.
sentences.chinese: 那个兵两脚跟咔嗒一声，立正敬礼。

sentences.english: Soldiers click their heels when they stand to attention.
sentences.chinese: 战士们立正的时候，鞋后跟发出咔哒声。

sentences.english: Spring to attention when the captain enters.
sentences.chinese: 上尉一进来，就要迅速立正站好。

sentences.english: " Mr. President, " Arbatov reported, standing at attention.
sentences.chinese: “总统先生，”阿尔巴托夫立正报告说。

sentences.english: The men were at attention as the inspecting officer passed through the ranks.
sentences.chinese: 当检阅官从队伍中走过时，士兵们都立正。

sentences.english: The soldiers are standing at ease now.
sentences.chinese: 士兵们现在在立正稍息。

sentences.english: The sergeant brought the guard smartly to attention and saluted the inspecting officer.
sentences.chinese: 班长令卫队立正并向检阅官敬礼。

definition: to follow your orders/to do as you bid
to stand respectfully/(of trees, mountains) standing tall and majestic
to march at parade step/March! (military command)
variant of 畢恭畢敬|毕恭毕敬[bi4 gong1 bi4 jing4]
(military) to leave one's place in the ranks/to fall out/(fig.) to emerge/to become prominent
to shout an order or command
